name: Hunting vegan
description:
Hello everybody, 

this is Hunting Vegan! Fast paced game with elements from famous top down pixel art games.

I made this game for GameDev.tv gamejam as my personal challenge. I wanted to prove myself that I'm able to finish one simple game in less than a month and totally alone. 

Big and main thanks belongs to my girlfriend who helped me with this idea and also my all stream supporters and my friends who trust in me! 

I would like to ask you all to try this simple game and give me as much feedback as you can because I would like to publish this game on mobile platforms as well but main challenge is coming right now. I need to polish and fix all the major issues and add more content such as more food types, animate more animals and add online scoreboard for you to compete in!

Before hating my game, consider liking it! It's just fun and I made it for you! 

This is not finished game yet. You can go through levels but there are still a lot of things upcoming in further releases. I need to balance food spawn in respective percentage according to animals etc. 

Please consider providing me as much detailed feedback. I will really appreciate that. :)
